title: Butternut Squash and Prawn Soup
ingredients: ['425g peeled butternut squash, cubed', '750ml milk', '250ml chicken stock', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder', '1/4 teaspoon celery salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '150g small raw prawns, peeled and deveined', '2 pears, peeled, cored and diced', '1 tablespoon sherry wine or to taste']
